doc:
Smiley Burnette https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Smiley_Burnette 0 Lester Alvin Burnett (March 18, 1911 – February 16, 1967), better known as Smiley Burnette, was an American country music performer and a comedic actor in Western films and on radio and TV, playing sidekick to Gene Autry, Roy Rogers, and other B-movie cowboys. He was also a prolific singer-songwriter who could play as many as 100 musical instruments, some simultaneously. His career, beginning in 1934, spanned four decades, including a regular role on CBS-TV's Petticoat Junction in the 1960s. Lester_Alvin_Burnett ( March_18_,_1911 – February_16_,_1967 ) , better_known as Smiley_Burnette , was an_American_country_music_performer and a_comedic_actor in Western_films and on radio_and_TV , playing sidekick to Gene_Autry , Roy_Rogers , and other_B-movie_cowboys . He was also a_prolific_singer-songwriter who could_play as_many_as_100_musical_instruments , some_simultaneously . His_career , beginning in 1934 , spanned four_decades , including a_regular_role on CBS-TV 's_Petticoat_Junction in the_1960s .
